Ergonomics.comm: Comfortable and well-designed for long use.

cont.entity_a: Swappable batteries eliminate the need for docking. Battery life depletes quickly during gaming. Extra battery always charged is a convenience. Battery life is about a day, with a quick swap feature. Frequent battery swaps needed due to short life.
On-the-fly resolution change enhances gaming accuracy. Great for gaming with fast reaction time. Accurate tracking comparable to wired mice.
cont.entity_b: 10 programmable buttons enhance gaming utility. Reliable for gaming with adjustable weights. Excellent for high-resolution screens.

cont.entity_a: Durable with long-lasting usage over years.
cont.entity_b: Hard plastic pads on the bottom improve durability and glide. Cord is twist-resistant and durable. Durable materials with good grip.

cont.entity_a: WiFi interference issues. Connectivity issues with heavy WiFi traffic.

cont.entity_b: Laser tracks well with adjustable dpi settings. High accuracy and smooth laser tracking.
